author: Wayne
content: $AAPL isn’t a stock; it’s a way of life. This company isn’t going anywhere, and the long-term trend is always up. Ignore the noise, buy the dips.

author: Kevin
content: $AAPL feels overvalued. P/E near 30 while growth is slowing? Not a great setup. I’m trimming my position until I see something compelling in the product pipeline
